Rulings.Edison:
●Decayed Commander's card-discarding effect only activates when Decayed Commander attacks directly AND deals 1 or more points of Battle Damage to the opponent, so if the opponent uses Kuriboh or Waboku then Decayed Commander's effect does not activate.
●Decayed Commander does not activate its card-discarding effect if destroyed with Ring of Destruction, or if it attacks a face-down monster while equipped with Fairy Meteor Crush, or due to reflect damage from Relinquished, etc.

Rulings.Base: 1. The card-discarding effect of "Decayed Commander" only activates when "Decayed Commander" attacks directly AND deals 1 or more points of Battle Damage to the opponent, so if the opponent uses "Kuriboh" or "Waboku" then the effect of "Decayed Commander" does not activate.\n2. "Decayed Commander" does not activate its card-discarding effect if destroyed with "Ring of Destruction", or if it attacks a face-down monster while equipped with "Fairy Meteor Crush", or due to reflect damage from "Relinquished", etc.

PSCT.Base: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Zombie Tiger" from your hand. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Discard 1 random card from their hand.
